result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَءَامَنُواْ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡ كَفَّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَأَصۡلَحَ بَالَهُمۡ
result.translation: 2. Kaadu Yalla nummayseeh meqe- taamoomi abeeh, Mucammadal ﷺ obsime Qhuraan nummayse marah, usuk cakkil ken Rabbih xaquk oobe kitab kinni, ken Rabbi ken umaaneena keenik duugeeh, caagid keenik yeymeeqeh addunyaay akeeral.
